title: NVIDIA RTX 2080 - You KNOW You Want One!!
description: NVIDIA has officially announced their RTX 2080, RTX 2080 Ti and RTX 2070.  The new Turing architecture is fast, packs a bunch of new features and... they happen to cost A LOT!  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  BUY Cooler Master MK750:    Subscribe    Hardware Canucks' trip to Gamescom was paid for by NVIDIA.  As per HWC guidelines, no direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:  Join Our Folding team   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #rtx2080 #rtx2080ti #hardwarecanucks
